snippet: The Obama campaign hit back aggressively at Mitt Romney's charge that President Obama has not led on foreign policy, accusing the former Massachusetts governor of an "erratic, unsteady and irresponsible" national security strategy.
abstract: The Obama campaign hit back aggressively at Mitt Romney's charge that President Obama has not led on foreign policy, accusing the former Massachusetts governor of an "erratic, unsteady and irresponsible" national security strategy.

headline.main: Obama Campaign Hits Back on Romney Foreign Policy Speech
